title: NASA finds evidence of ancient beach on Mars
description: NASA’s Perseverance rover revealed evidence of an ancient beach on Mars.The rover spent nearly a year exploring the rim of a crater believed to have held a huge lake; the rocks show signs of having been shaped and altered by waves, creating a sandy layer. Shorelines on Earth are key sites for...

title: Treks through time: Ancient trade routes you can still walk today
description: Explore four ancient Indian trade routes you can still walk today—from the Silk Route to spice and salt trails—where history, commerce and culture intersect.

title: Scientists Found That This Ancient Shark Was Bigger Than a Boat, and It’s a Relative of the Great White
description: Buried for 9 million years in Peru’s desert, a giant shark fossil has been unearthed, and what scientists found inside left them speechless.

title: 1,000-year-old Maya manuscript could track solar eclipses revealing ancient astronomical secrets
description: 1,000-year-old Maya manuscript could track solar eclipses revealing ancient astronomical secrets

title: 30 ancient sites damaged during border clashes
description: The Fine Arts Department has found damage to around 30 ancient sites from recent conflicts along the Thai–Cambodian border and has scheduled a meeting on Friday to discuss restoration plans.
